101.question_desc: Do you prefer sunny or rainy days?
hero_comment: Sunny days! Hmm? You think the same way? That's great! We can go out together and enjoy the sunshine!
Rainy days are also nice. Listening to the sound of raindrops outside the window is soothing and helps me sleep, though I still prefer sunny days!

102.question_desc: Do you prefer cats or dogs?
hero_comment: Cats are super adorable! I'd love to raise cats with you. Oh! Going on missions with Lord Mimir is sort of raising a cat, right?
You prefer dogs, don’t you? Well, there's an incredibly cute dog at the grocery store downstairs. You've gotta take me to have a look!
Oh, you're too modest! You're definitely the most reliable person to me. I really trust you!
You're definitely the most reliable person to me, I really trust you!
I'm very confident in my grilling skills. You've gotta try my hand-grilled skewers. Hey... How about going to my place now?!
Wow, that's great... I didn't expect to see this side from the workaholic Admin...I'd love to taste your cooking!

105.question_desc: Do you prefer juice or dairy-based drinks?
hero_comment: Oh? You like them too! That's great! I stocked up a whole bunch last holiday. I'll send you some. Daily juice supplies really fill people with vitality!
You like those sorts of drinks? Noted! The next time I have a big beverage purchase, I'll buy some!

201.question_desc: Do you prefer hiking or rock climbing?
hero_comment: Hiking is so relaxing. You think so too, don't you, Admin? When could we go on a hike together?
Oh, you like rock climbing, huh? It's quite an extreme activity!

202.question_desc: Do you prefer documentaries or sci-fi movies?
hero_comment: I enjoy watching documentaries at home on weekends. We can watch together when you're free if you like.
Oh? I haven't watched many sci-fi movies, maybe you can recommend some to me?

203.question_desc: Who's got better sense of direction?
hero_comment: Admin... Do you remember the last time I got lost?
I always feel like I’m in safe hands when I’m out with you.

204.question_desc: Do you prefer summer or winter?
hero_comment: The sea is the most beautiful during the summer. Stars wane and sink into the ocean at night and shimmer on the surface as dawn breaks... I really hope we can see it together.
Winter is also great, it's the perfect season for soaking in hot springs.
Well then, has anything been troubling you lately, Admin? You can talk to me about it.
Oh? You want me to talk more about myself?

301.question_desc: Do you prefer staying at home or going outside on days off?
hero_comment: On days off? I like playing chess at home. Taking a break from work to clear my mind really helps with dealing with the next challenge. I'm glad you feel the same way.
You like using your free time to broaden your horizons? That's a great idea. I'll bear that in mind.

302.question_desc: Do you enjoy cooking in your free time?
hero_comment: ...You can cook? It seems like you understand life better.
Efficiently managing your fragmented time is an essential part of advancing co-ordination progress. We are indeed the same sort of people.

303.question_desc: Do you prefer warm or cool colors?
hero_comment: You prefer warm colors? It seems... I've discovered a new side of you.
Cool colors bring clarity of mind. I'm glad you agree with it.

304.question_desc: Do you prefer crowded or quiet places?
hero_comment: ...You prefer bustling places? Any recommendations for fun places to go?
Quiet places let you calm down and experience your true self. I love that feeling. How about you? Do you have similar experiences?"
Is that what you think? ...Or maybe we should say that you usually read my mind first.
You can always sense when others have difficulty. That's one of the reasons I admire you.

401.question_desc: Do you prefer sunrise or sunset?
hero_comment: I see. You prefer sunrise, don't you?
Sunset is beautiful! You think the same, little lamb? Very well.

402.question_desc: Who's better at processing complicated information?
hero_comment: Oh, being counted on by little lamb is great.
Apart from Mintha and Leuce, no one else is more suitable to be my assistant than you.

403.question_desc: Do you prefer spring or autumn?
hero_comment: You prefer spring, little lamb? That's adorable.
Autumn's a season of change. I really like it.

404.question_desc: Do you prefer pop music or classical music?
hero_comment: Who can resist the refined pleasure of classical music? I'm satisfied that you are keeping up with me, little lamb.
So you like that sort of music, little lamb? How novel.

405.question_desc: Do you prefer sweet or sour?
hero_comment: You're not saying that just to please me, are you, little lamb?
Your taste is as unique as you are, little lamb. I'm getting more and more curious about you."

501.question_desc: Do you prefer feather or buckwheat pillows?
hero_comment: I like soft ones... You do too, Admin! I'm happy.
So you like... this? What kind of dreams do you have when you sleep on it?

502.question_desc: Who can handle spicy food better?
hero_comment: Me? Spicy food? Ah... no, please...
Spicy food made me cry... but You didn't. You're tough!

503.question_desc: Are you a morning or an evening person?
hero_comment: Morning... it's bright... I can't sleep well...
Sleepy... I like the evening... cuddling up... Yawn... no light...

504.question_desc: Do you prefer fruit candy or dark chocolate?
hero_comment: Sweet... I like it... You like it too... Let me give you some...
Bitter...
Hmm... Huh? Are you... talking about me?
Admin... always has great fun... with everyone... I always fall asleep...

2125212.question_desc: What memory left the deepest impression on you?

2125213.question_desc: Where would you like to go on vacation?

2125215.question_desc: Do you prefer sunny or rainy days?

2125216.question_desc: How do you think I'm doing in terms of combat?
answer_desc: You're doing the best you can.

2125221.question_desc: Do you have any hobbies outside of doing research?

2125223.question_desc: How's your health at the moment?

2125224.question_desc: What's it like living as a human among Modifiers?
answer_desc: It's just like living anywhere else.

2125225.question_desc: What do you think of me?

2125226.question_desc: What kind of gift would you like?

2125231.question_desc: Who's stronger, you or the hero of the Prime Codex?

2125232.question_desc: Do you like to play video games?

2125233.question_desc: Did you have fun training in Ruomu Palace?

2125234.question_desc: Do you want to learn the Astral Arcanum?

2125235.question_desc: Would you like to try my cooking?

2125236.question_desc: What do you think of the Prime Codex?
answer_desc: It's a pretty good shoujo manga.
It's an ancient and sacred text!

2125241.question_desc: What do you usually do in the Imago Room?

2125243.question_desc: Has your opinion of me changed?

2125244.question_desc: Why are humans so bored that they'll fight over what's better, savory or sweet foods? So... I ask you, which do you like better, potato chips or cream puffs?

2125245.question_desc: Hey, what style do you think suits me better?

2125246.question_desc: What kind of stories do you prefer?

2125251.question_desc: What do you do when you're not at the Quad?

2125252.question_desc: If I gave you a steamer of soup dumplings covered in cilantro, would you eat them?

2125253.question_desc: Do you like being around children?

2125254.question_desc: Do you still keep your guard up around me?

2125255.question_desc: What do you think of my conduct?

2125256.question_desc: If we had the chance, would you go back to Xu Heng's Old Town with me?
